prompt:
Image Prompt:
Create an ethereal and majestic depiction of God Almighty seated on a throne surrounded by radiant light and heavenly beings. Show God as a figure of immense power and glory, emanating warmth and compassion. Include symbolic elements such as a crown, a glowing aura, and a sense of divine presence to evoke the awe-inspiring nature of the Almighty. Capture the essence of divine sovereignty and benevolence in a visually captivating and spiritually uplifting composition.
